CustomField.formula: "[ ref:_" & LEFT( $Organization.Id ,5) & SUBSTITUTE(RIGHT( $Organization.Id ,11), "0", "" )& "._" & LEFT(Id,5) & SUBSTITUTE(Left(RIGHT(Id,10), 5), "0", "") & RIGHT(Id,5) & ":ref ]"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please copy this thread Id and the brackets to the end of the subject of any email related to this ticket. which are retained in the eNett Delivery mailbox. This will allow the email to be attached to the ticket by the system.
CustomField.label: Ticket Thread ID
